item.title: First Blog (on the site)
item.description: This is really to just get started, I don’t have anything in my mind right now except for thinking about ongoing situation because of the pandemic. Coming to the point I’ll document all the major experiences I’ve gained involving opensource development, research, and other exciting stuff like game AI, philosophy, and ongoing topics. Till then goodbye… and stay safe.
item.content: This is really to just get started, I don’t have anything in my mind right now except for thinking about ongoing situation because of the pandemic. Coming to the point I’ll document all the major experiences I’ve gained involving opensource development, research, and other exciting stuff like game AI, philosophy, and ongoing topics. Till then goodbye… and stay safe.
